ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 193
ygData.msgSnippet: Um, no.The level 16 pet only uses 2 chips.I am pretty sure that all pets above the level 1 pet(I think that one uses only 1 chip) use only 2 chips.And I know
ygData.messageBody:
Um, no.The level 16 pet only uses 2 chips.I am pretty sure that all pets
above the level 1 pet(I think that one uses only 1 chip) use only 2 chips.And
I know for a FACT that if nothing better, all the ones up to 20 do.

In a message dated 12/4/99 2:23:10 AM Pacific Standard Time,
EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com writes:

<< Message: 13
Date: Fri, 3 Dec 1999 13:46:59 -0500
From: Christopher King <CKing@...>
Subject: Bones, bones bones...

ok.. call me silly:

Up till now (lev 16 jsut last night) I have been bonecollecting by huniting.
I like the self sufficient feeling it gives me!
But if I read correctly the 16th lev pet uses 5 bones per cast! that will be
hard to harvest. So time to buy. It never occurred to me before, but ARE
there vendors who sell bone chips in quantity? At the guild maybe? I have
only seen single chips on vendors out in the fields and such...

thx :)
<blushes>
Stricken
Gnome, Vallon Zek
>>
